channel.title: Runescape 2006 server remake
channel.description:
[left][b] RS[2006] remake[/b][/left] [center]This is a brand new project all I've done is make a web client and a few slight changes [/center] [left]Hey guys I am working on a RS[2006] remake.[/left]
Working woodcutting Amazing old school feel No God swords or any overpowered items Great economy Great Starter base Very straightforward server Working firemaking Working Cooking Working Woodcutting with Stumps Working Runecrafting Working Agility And many more skills No items over 369 Relive that oldschool feeling Working Purple Sweets ! Home teleport no longer requires 1 law rune other teleports do Full 63 waves jad Tz kih now drains prayer Starter pack edited removed 250k and d scimitar D mace bug fixed Dagannoth kings added working great ! Home moved back to Draynor Recipe for disaster soon to be added Elemental workshop soon to be added Dagannoths require a team of 2-3 players Many more updates soon to come ! Cooks Assistant Quest added will post vid soon ! Sailing has been added will post a vid soon ! Creating SplitBark Added ! 100% credits to vox Cracking Wallsafes Weapon Sounds Added Music Added Item animations added ! Clue Scrolls Four fully functional quests added !
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img4/5388/startere.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img42/111/questr.png[/img] We need Coders me (open) (open) we developers (open) (open)
Name: Age: Applying For: Experience: Evidence of previous works: How active will you be: Skype:
